" i do n't like listening to comedians tell me how the world works , " kinane says . " there 's no way that kkk members are only eating eastern european - based foods , " he jokes . on thursday , the 41-year - old comedian and voice - over artist brings his act to d.c . 9:30 club , 815 v st . nw ; thu . , 7 p.m. , $ 25 .
